song_name: Departure - Lufia and the Fortress of Doom
metrics_conclusion: Departure - Lufia and the Fortress of Doom has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Departure - Lufia and the Fortress of Doom is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music.
